mlr.mini 0.0.0.9000

Combine Hyperparameter objetcs into a Hyperparameter Space

Source: R/hyperparameters.R
HyperparameterSpace.Rd

If there are unnamed Hyperparameters given, we start naming them from x, y, z, a, ... Unique names are ensured.

HyperparameterSpace(...)

hp(...)

Arguments

...

List of named or unnamed Hyperparameters

Examples

HyperparameterSpace(p_int(0, 9), p_dbl(lower = 0))
#>    name    type    range
#> 1:    x integer   [0, 9]
#> 2:    y numeric [0, Inf]
hp(category = p_fct(c("a", "b", "c")), alpha = p_dbl(0, 1))
#>        name    type                      range
#> 1: category  factor {'a', 'b', 'c'} (3 levels)
#> 2:    alpha numeric                     [0, 1]
